Marina Bay Sands.description: Marina Bay Sands is an iconic integrated resort in Singapore, featuring the world's largest rooftop infinity pool, luxury shopping, celebrity chef restaurants, and the world-class Marina Bay Sands Casino.

events.title: Summer Spectacular
events.description: Enjoy special rates on luxury suites and exclusive access to the infinity pool.

events.title: Dining Package
events.description: 3-course dinner at CUT by Wolfgang Puck with complimentary wine pairing.

Gardens by the Bay.description: Gardens by the Bay is a nature park spanning 101 hectares in central Singapore. It features the iconic Supertree Grove, Cloud Forest, and Flower Dome conservatories.

events.title: Garden Rhapsody Light Show
events.description: Daily light and sound show at the Supertree Grove. Free admission.

events.title: Orchid Extravaganza
events.description: Special exhibition featuring rare and exotic orchids in the Flower Dome.
